content: Phase 1.1: Omar's Professional Context Discovery - systematic capture of background, role, projects
Phase 1.1b: Active Projects & Strategic Priorities - current work and Claude Code objectives
Phase 1.1c: Documentation & Communication Needs - 150-word governance requirements
Phase 1.2: Technical Environment Audit - machine specs, development environment, constraints
Phase 1.2a: PowerShell System Collector - OS, CPU, memory, storage, GPU, network, security
Phase 1.2b: CLI Toolchain Collector - development tools and version detection
Phase 1.2c: Profile Validation & Rendering - JSON validation and Markdown report
Phase 1.2d: Section 5 Integration - update questionnaire with exact specs
Phase 1.3: Collaboration Pattern Optimization - communication preferences, working patterns
Phase 2.1: Documentation Architecture Setup - create 150-word template and URL structure
Phase 2.2: Agent Documentation Generation - systematic 150-word docs for 120+ agents
Phase 2.3: Infrastructure & System Documentation - REP+PADA and core modules
Phase 2.4: Maintenance Framework - automated update system and quality gates
Phase 3.1: Documentation Integration - embed docs in user interfaces
Phase 3.2: REP+PADA Documentation Enhancement - systematic validation and automation
Phase 3.3: Ecosystem Optimization - validate frameworks against foundational context
